entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
